# init(integersIn:)

**Initializer**

Initializes an index set with a range of integers.

## Declaration

```swift
init(integersIn range: Range<IndexSet.Element>)
```

## Creating an Index Set

- **init()**: Initializes an empty index set.
- **init(integer:)**: Initializes an index set with a single integer.
